### Clinical Postings (8 weeks)

1.  Bedside history taking
2.  Examination of Joints
3.  Examination of swelling/tumors
4.  Examination of nerve injury
5.  Observe OT, casualty (OR13.2)
6.  Pre-op and post-op patient examination
7.  Attend OPD, OT, emergency (OR13.1)
8.  Ward rounds
9.  Plaster care (OR13.1)
10. Clinical teaching in wards
11. X-rays, orthotics, prosthetics
12. Path specimens, instruments\
